document.title: Kate's Upper Arch Braces Treatment Plan
document.summary: Your treatment involves using traditional braces to address alignment in the upper teeth. This process is expected to take approximately 7–10 months. Given the moderate complexity of your case, we'll use a combination of remote monitoring and in-person visits to track your progress effectively. Some attachments may be used to assist with specific movements during your treatment.
next_steps: Follow guidance from your dental team for best results
